Primary Energy: Earth 4 (sticky webbing control effect) Supporting Energy: Space 6 (medium range + 20ft radius + 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (20-foot radius) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 10 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Fill area with sticky webs anchored to surfaces. Creatures in area when created or entering area make [[/save type=reflex]]. Compare their successes to your weaving successes. If you have more, target becomes Restrained. Restrained creatures can use action + Athletics or [[/check skill=acrobatics]] (2 successes needed) to escape. Webs are flammable; fire damage to 5ft area destroys webs in that section. Saving Throw: Reflex (to avoid being Restrained) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = Partial web (10ft radius, 1 round), 2 = Full effect (20ft radius, 1 minute), 3 = Enhanced (30ft radius, 10 minutes), 4 = Maximum (40ft radius, 1 hour) Restrained Condition: See conditions document. Target cannot move, has Misfortune on attacks, attackers have Fortune against them, Misfortune on Reflex saves.
